item.title: Cookbook Now Live
item.description:
The cookbook is now live. You can find it here.

It has a separate RSS feed from the one for blog posts. You may need to adjust your existing RSS link as I made some changes to that on the back end. You can find the most up to date versions of the RSS links at the bottom of this page and on the cookbook page.

The cookbook is a bit barren right now but I figured it was better have it public than not at this time.

Happy cooking!
